entry.title: Saturday: Wet snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wet snow mixed with rain beginning early this morning and ending early this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
